attributes.action: Campaign for regular ultrasound or MRI for the over 30’s
attributes.additional_details: I am part of a facebook page for the Uk breast cancer supporters and survivors. It is of a worry to me and others that the age of patients is getting younger, and some of these are not surviving.
attributes.background: I would like the health secretary to provide funds for checks to be routinely carried out

rejection.details:
You may like to sign the below petitions we currently have open on this topic:

Offer breast screenings for cancer to women from the age of 30
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/576989

Fund regular breast screenings from age 18
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578445
